data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gonçalves, Rodrigo B., Melo, Gabriel A. R. (2006): Notes on the Neotropical bee genera Agapostemonoides Roberts & Brooks and Rhinetula Friese, with description of a new species of Agapostemonoides (Hymenoptera, Apidae, Halictinae). Zootaxa 1136: 39-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171976
